statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Mexican Shade Grown coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.90} per pound with some Organic Free Trade coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.60} per pound to create \displaystyle{30} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.64} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Mexican Shade Grown coffee.
pounds of Organic Free Trade coffee.
